# Task Lists

```````````````````````````````` example
- [ ] foo
- [x] bar
- [X] baz
.
<ul>
<li class="task-list-item"><input class="task-list-item-checkbox" type="checkbox" disabled checked/>foo</li>
<li class="task-list-item"><input class="task-list-item-checkbox" type="checkbox" disabled checked/>bar</li>
<li class="task-list-item"><input class="task-list-item-checkbox" type="checkbox" disabled checked/>baz</li>
</ul>
````````````````````````````````

```````````````````````````````` example
- foo
- [ ] bar
.
<ul>
<li>foo</li>
<li class="task-list-item"><input class="task-list-item-checkbox" type="checkbox" disabled checked/>bar</li>
</ul>
````````````````````````````````

```````````````````````````````` example
- foo

- [ ] bar
- [x] baz

  text
.
<ul>
<li><p>foo</p>
</li>
<li class="task-list-item"><p><input class="task-list-item-checkbox" type="checkbox" disabled checked/>bar</p>
</li>
<li class="task-list-item"><p><input class="task-list-item-checkbox" type="checkbox" disabled checked/>baz</p>
<p>text</p>
</li>
</ul>
````````````````````````````````

```````````````````````````````` example
1. [ ] foo
2. [x] bar
3. [X] baz
.
<ol>
<li class="task-list-item"><input class="task-list-item-checkbox" type="checkbox" disabled checked/>foo</li>
<li class="task-list-item"><input class="task-list-item-checkbox" type="checkbox" disabled checked/>bar</li>
<li class="task-list-item"><input class="task-list-item-checkbox" type="checkbox" disabled checked/>baz</li>
</ol>
````````````````````````````````
